author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
Combined backport of #41947 and #41958.
 - Updates the 2023 MC realistic GTs to **preliminary** GTs for 2023 MC production, see [this CMSTalk post](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/mc-call-for-conditions-for-2023-mc/24376/10)
 - Updates the L1T menu tag to be compatible with HLT menu `v1.2` in relval/ideal/2024/run4 GTs (see [this CMSTalk post](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/update-of-the-2023-l1-menu-tag-l1menu-collisions2023-v1-2-0/25410))
 - Updates the Run3 data GTs snapshot

**GT differences** (listing here because these are 130X GTs, while in master they are 131X):
- **run3_hlt:** https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_dataRun3_HLT_frozen_v2/130X_dataRun3_HLT_frozen_v3
   - Difference wrt production GT: https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_dataRun3_HLT_v2/130X_dataRun3_HLT_frozen_v3
- **run3_data_express:**  https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_dataRun3_Express_frozen_v2/130X_dataRun3_Express_frozen_v3
   - Difference wrt production GT: https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_dataRun3_Express_v3/130X_dataRun3_Express_frozen_v3
- **run3_data_prompt:**  https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_dataRun3_Prompt_frozen_v2/130X_dataRun3_Prompt_frozen_v3
   - Difference wrt production GT: https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_dataRun3_Prompt_v4/130X_dataRun3_Prompt_frozen_v3
- **phase1_2023_design:** https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2023_design_v6/130X_mcRun3_2023_design_v7
- **phase1_2023_realistic:** https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v8/130X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v9
- **phase1_2023_cosmics:** https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2023cosmics_realistic_deco_v7/130X_mcRun3_2023cosmics_realistic_deco_v8
- **phase1_2023_cosmics_design:** https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2023cosmics_design_deco_v6/130X_mcRun3_2023cosmics_design_deco_v7
- **phase1_2024_realistic:** https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v6/130X_mcRun3_2024_realistic_v7
- **phase2_realistic:** https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/130X_mcRun4_realistic_v7/130X_mcRun4_realistic_v8

#### PR validation:
Tested with:
```
runTheMatrix.py -l 138.4,138.5,139.001,12434.0,12834.0,23234.0 -j 8 --ibeos
```

#### Backport:
Combined backport of #41947 and #41958.
title: [13_0_X] Add preliminary GTs for 2023 MC and new L1T menu to relval/ideal/2024/run4 GTs and re-snapshot data GTS
